overview: Dolphin Entertainment proudly presents Russian Beauty Vol. 2: Oleg. This film is about superstar Oleg Vorobyev - one of Dolphin`s first exclusive models - and how he began his career with Dolphin Entertainment as an innocent boy and grew into being a man. Each scene features a commentary by Oleg and director Alex Clark.It`s thrilling to watch Oleg go down the memory lane, talking about his favorite partners as well as the most exciting (and worst) moments of his adult career. He has been featured in many magazines, and his films have sold thousands of copies worldwide.This film contains scenes from the First Time series, Young and Innocent, and Something About Dolphin`s, which was nominated at the 2004 GayVN Awards. In the hit Spy Games Part 1, Oleg was featured with sexy Evgeniy in an unforgettable, totally romantic, latex-free scene which was shot around beautiful landscaping. If you haven`t seen this scene you are definitely missing out.
title: Russian Beauty 2: Oleg
